hibernate-mapping.query: select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition as pd where pd.name = :name order by pd.version desc
select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition as pd where pd.name = :name and pd.version = :version
select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition as pd order by pd.name, pd.version desc
select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition as pd where pd.name = :name order by pd.version desC
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance as pi where pi.processDefinition.id = :processDefinitionId order by pi.start desc
select token from org.jbpm.graph.exe.Token token where token.processInstance = :processInstance
select pl from org.jbpm.logging.log.ProcessLog as pl where pl.token in (:tokens)
select t from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance t where t.taskMgmtInstance.processInstance = :processInstance
delete from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance t where t.id in (:taskInstanceIds)
delete from org.jbpm.msg.Message m where m.token = :token
select pl from org.jbpm.logging.log.ProcessLog as pl where pl.token = :token order by pl.index
select message from org.jbpm.msg.Message as message where message.destination = :destination and message.isSuspended != true and message.exception is null
select message from org.jbpm.msg.Message as message where message.destination = :destination and message.isSuspended != true and message.exception is not null
update org.jbpm.msg.Message m set m.isSuspended = true where m.token = :token
update org.jbpm.msg.Message m set m.isSuspended = false where m.token = :token
select ti from org.jbpm.scheduler.exe.Timer as ti where ti.exception is null and ti.isSuspended != true order by ti.dueDate asc
select ti from org.jbpm.scheduler.exe.Timer as ti where ti.exception is not null order by ti.dueDate asc
select ti from org.jbpm.scheduler.exe.Timer as ti where ti.isSuspended = true order by ti.dueDate asc
select t from org.jbpm.scheduler.exe.Timer t where t.name = :timerName and t.token = :token
delete from org.jbpm.scheduler.exe.Timer t where t.processInstance = :processInstance
update org.jbpm.scheduler.exe.Timer t set t.isSuspended = true where t.token = :token
update org.jbpm.scheduler.exe.Timer t set t.isSuspended = false where t.token = :token
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance as ti where ti.actorId = :actorId and ti.isOpen = true
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance as ti where ti.actorId = :actorId
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance as ti where ti.actorId in ( :actorIds ) and ti.isOpen = true
select distinct ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.PooledActor pooledActor join pooledActor.taskInstances ti where pooledActor.actorId = :swimlaneActorId and ti.actorId is null and ti.isOpen = true
select distinct ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.PooledActor pooledActor join pooledActor.taskInstances ti where pooledActor.actorId in ( :actorIds ) and ti.actorId is null and ti.isOpen = true
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.token.id = :tokenId and ti.isOpen = true
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.id in ( :taskInstanceIds )
